overview: Housebound because of illness, Caroline (Maisie Williams) hasn’t been to school in months or had many visitors - until classmate Anthony (Zach Wyatt) bursts into her room uninvited, armed with waffle fries and a copy of Walt Whitman’s Leaves of Grass.
tagline: Filmed performance of Hampstead Theatre's 2018 production of I and You by Lauren Gunderson
title: I and You
